term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - local fraction volatilized, χ_v,β_v in flame emission and absorption spectrometry
term.title: local fraction volatilized

item.text: The substance fraction of the volatilized component in the total desolvated component. The gaseous state includes free atoms, molecules and radicals. This quantity is measured in a defined part of the flame, usually the observation space. The fraction volatilized varies inversely with the size of the desolvated particles. Since χ v varies markedly with the height in the flame, its observed value represents an average.
